pages.title: About
pages.text: I am a front-end developer with more than 8 years of experience. Currently I'm focused on a single-page application development with Vue.js. Basically I prefer rational minimalism and pay special attention to create user-friendly interfaces.

pages.title: Portfolio
pages.text: When I work on my projects I implement the best modern practices if necessary. I follow the latest trends in front-end development, web design, UX/UI.

pages.title: Tools
pages.text: Useful tools and resources to automate routine tasks. I use most of them in my work regularly.
Oops, nothing found. This page has probably been removed or you have followed an outdated link.

sections.title: Skills
sections.text: I use a wide stack of modern development tools. I take training courses on new technologies quite often, so this list is regularly updated.

sections.title: Work Experience
sections.text: As a web-developer I started with remote projects for different web studios. And I am grateful to everyone I've ever managed to work with in team.

sections.title: Education
sections.text: The front-end development industry is constantly changing, that's why I regularly improve my professional skills and attend meetups.

experience.text: Development and support for CMS websites (Bitrix, Joomla and Wordpress). About 100 projects of various difficulty levels were developed (from landing pages to online stores) with my participation.

Architecture planning of projects and implementation of new tools in the production cycle. Participation in the development of user interface. Technical interviewing and training new employees.

facts.title: Fun Fact

fallback.text: Are you tired of clicking that button yet?

items: I developed my first site when table layout was still mainstream
I don't like to work in the morning because the best ideas come in the evening
I got drunk when Microsoft stopped supporting IE
My favorite music artists are Kasabian, Royksopp and Foals
I don't like corporate parties, but I'm crazy about IT conferences
I am not into sports but I enjoy cycling and walking
Another hobby of mine is making electronic music
I'm old enough to remember Flash sites, GIF backgrounds and guestbooks
I love horror films and sci-fi
Saint Petersburg, Kazan and Yekaterinburg are my favorite Russian cities
I can't go a day without a cup of coffee or energy drink
Thanks to the COVID I have started updating this site -_-
It is very important for me to understand that my work is not useless and helps other people
Once I got so carried away with a project that I didn't sleep for four nights in a row
A job where you have to sit from 9 to 18 sucks. A job with deadlines is a dream
On YouTube, I most often watch IT videos and lectures on astrophysics
Algebra and chemistry are my favorite school subjects
I swore never to work with Bitrix again
My favorite types of projects are CRM and admin panels
I am convinced that a successful project is a combination of competent management and a strong development team
I don't understand anything about arthouse and contemporary art
My favorite TV series - Â«Black MirrorÂ» and Â«LostÂ»
